name: The Reader
description:
The Reader is an IF adaptation of an unpublished short story that I wrote some months ago (if you want to publish it give me a little whistle!). 

It’s a short story about the memory of those who were long gone fighting against a very mundane evil. It’s a political-horror piece about Spain, our somehow weird traditions, and our history. 

The game is free (but if you donate some money it’d definitely help me write some more)!!!

TW: This story contains: violence, depictions of death and political content (yes, a lot of it).
